verses.verse: And Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> either <S%H376><s%> of them his censer, <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> therein, <S%H2004><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%> and offered <S%H7126><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he commanded <S%H6680><s%> them not.
And there went <S%H3318><s%> out fire <S%H784><s%> from the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and devoured <S%H398><s%> them, and they died <S%H4191><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> This <S%H1931><s%> is it that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke, <S%H1696><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I will be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in them that come <S%H7138><s%> near <S%H7138><s%> me, and before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> I will be glorified. <S%H3513><s%> And Aaron <S%H175><s%> held <S%H1826><s%> his peace. <S%H1826><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Mishael <S%H4332><s%> and Elzaphan, <S%H469><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel <S%H5816><s%> the uncle <S%H1730><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, Come <S%H7126><s%> near, <S%H7126><s%> carry <S%H5375><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> out of the camp. <S%H4264><s%>
So they went <S%H7126><s%> near, <S%H7126><s%> and carried <S%H5375><s%> them in their coats <S%H3801><s%> out of the camp; <S%H4264><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had said. <S%H1696><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and to Ithamar, <S%H385><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> Uncover <S%H6544><s%> not your heads, <S%H7218><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> rend <S%H6533><s%> your clothes; <S%H899><s%> lest <S%H3808><s%> you die, <S%H4191><s%> and lest wrath <S%H7107><s%> come on all <S%H3605><s%> the people: <S%H5712><s%> but let your brothers, <S%H251><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> mourn <S%H1058><s%> the burning <S%H8316><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has kindled. <S%H8313><s%>

And you shall not go <S%H3318><s%> out from the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> you die: <S%H4191><s%> for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is on you. And they did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Do not drink <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> nor strong drink, <S%H7941><s%> you, nor your sons <S%H1121><s%> with you, when you go <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> lest <S%H3808><s%> you die: <S%H4191><s%> it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations: <S%H1755><s%>
And that you may put difference <S%H914><s%> between <S%H996><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> and unholy, <S%H2455><s%> and between <S%H996><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> and clean; <S%H2889><s%>

And that you may teach <S%H3384><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the statutes <S%H2706><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> to them by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and to Ithamar, <S%H385><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> that were left, <S%H3498><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> that remains <S%H3498><s%> of the offerings of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made by fire, and eat <S%H398><s%> it without <S%H4682><s%> leaven <S%H4682><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the altar: <S%H4196><s%> for it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy: <S%H6944><s%>

And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it is your due, <S%H2706><s%> and your sons' <S%H1121><s%> due, <S%H2706><s%> of the sacrifices of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made by fire: for so <S%H3651><s%> I am commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

And the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and heave <S%H8641><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> shall you eat <S%H398><s%> in a clean <S%H2889><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%> you, and your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> with you: for they be your due, <S%H2706><s%> and your sons' <S%H1121><s%> due, <S%H2706><s%> which are given <S%H5414><s%> out of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

The heave <S%H8641><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> and the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> shall they bring <S%H935><s%> with the offerings made by fire of the fat, <S%H2459><s%> to wave <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be yours, and your sons' <S%H1121><s%> with you, by a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever; <S%H5769><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> diligently sought <S%H1875><s%> the goat <S%H8163><s%> of the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was burnt: <S%H8313><s%> and he was angry <S%H7107><s%> with Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar, <S%H385><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> which were left <S%H3498><s%> alive, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Why <S%H4069><s%> have you not eaten <S%H398><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> seeing <S%H3588><s%> it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy, <S%H6944><s%> and God has given <S%H5414><s%> it you to bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD?

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of it was not brought <S%H935><s%> in within <S%H6441><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> place: you should indeed have eaten <S%H398><s%> it in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, as I commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> have they offered <S%H7126><s%> their sin <S%H2403><s%> offering and their burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and such <S%H428><s%> things have befallen <S%H7122><s%> me: and if I had eaten <S%H398><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering to day, <S%H3117><s%> should it have been accepted <S%H3190><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD? <S%H3068><s%>
And when Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that, he was content. <S%H3190><s%>
